description: Try our easy to follow Almond & Apricot Energy Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bliss & protein ball,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Vegan,Low sugar
name: Almond & Apricot Energy Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the almonds, apricots, oats, and peanut butter in a blender and whizz until combined.
Turn the mixture out onto a clean work surface. With damp hands, shape the mixture into walnut-sized balls.
Roll the balls in either desiccated coconut or cocoa powder. Store for up to 3 days in an airtight container.
